data.desc: Dutch pirates, buccaneers or privateers raid or assault Bodegas del Golfo [Lake Izabal = Golfo Dulce] or Castillo de San Felipe [Golfo Dulce]
data.note: Dec 1683. Du pirate Zanques enters Lake Izabal = Golfo Dulce, reaches Bodegas, enters R Polochic to Verapaz, reaches Turucub where they kidnap Indian Gaspar Quema and his wife, and retire /v Rodriguez C 40-41 /GUATEMALA,280
